default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Sending out so many cops just to catch a Syndican gangster. Your subordinates are honestly... beyond useless.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: It's not enough to simply possess power. You must also put it to good use.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: What do they say, that these are humanity's limits? What a joke. Humans will never stop pushing beyond their limits.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: I've been waiting for so long.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: You messed with the wrong person.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: This is not the end. Don't give in!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: I, am the Legion!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: I can't... go down like this...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Hey, looks like you're free. How about taking a trip to the Syndicate with me? Quite a few people are eager to meet you.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Your boss keeps switching my guards. Are they really so scared? Scared of an imprisoned Sinner, or a mediocre Syndican gangster?

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: My subordinates are not just obsessed with muscles, they adore the brainy type too. Hmm... You seem qualified. Quit working for the government and join the Legion!

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Guns? We don't rely on them in fights. A warrior trusts only their fists and their will. What's more, Syndicate's guns have long been tainted.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Only violence can end violence. That's the only answer Syndicate has given us. Those who once had dreams have all died for nothing.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Those abandoned factories are remnants of the city's golden era. That's the glory Syndicans must reclaim.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: "No matter who they've lost, the Legion's commander must remain calm." But if something happened to you, I can't imagine what I would do...

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: When we first met, you were just a rookie I could easily lift with a single arm. It surprises me... how you haven't changed a bit. But you're also the strongest person I've ever met. I'll keep counting on you in the future, Chief.

default.title: Idle
default.text: It does look like there are a few people here... I can have a bout with.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Are you... provoking me?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Are you going to just watch? Why don't we have a bout instead? I'll stand there without moving, and I won't even use my hands.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: A piece of cake. My guys in the Legion will get it done in no time.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: See? Told you it was easy.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Hmm... That's not enough.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Time for a little exercise.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Wow, you're pretty brave...

wolves_strike_soon.title: Obtain Attire
wolves_strike_soon.text: Tell those gangs that the Legion is here—to declare war on all of you!

wolves_strike_soon.title: Greeting
wolves_strike_soon.text: Ha, you're late. Keep up. Didn't you say you want to witness the reformation of Syndicate? Stay with me at all times then.

wolves_strike_soon.title: Ordinary Contact 1
wolves_strike_soon.text: Who will be our first opponent? Ted? Yagyu? Why don't they all come at once? It will be the same.

wolves_strike_soon.title: Ordinary Contact 2
wolves_strike_soon.text: I'll leave the planning to Earl. I just need to open the way ahead–which is what he needs most.

wolves_strike_soon.title: Ordinary Contact 3
wolves_strike_soon.text: Rust, smoke, and endless violence. Syndicate never changes. I'm sick of it... Go. Destroy everything. It's time for a change.

wolves_strike_soon.title: Ordinary Contact 4
wolves_strike_soon.text: The Legion doesn't need a stronghold. The whole of Syndicate is the territory of the wolves.

wolves_strike_soon.title: Idle
wolves_strike_soon.text: We have more enemies than this, but as long as those guys in the gutter dare to show up...

wolves_strike_soon.title: Special Attention
wolves_strike_soon.text: Oh? Have you finally decided to join the Legion?

wolves_strike_soon.title: Level Up
wolves_strike_soon.text: Humph. I look forward to the battle.

wolves_strike_soon.title: Pat Head
wolves_strike_soon.text: I feel like you've... got a lot more guts lately.

supreme_negotiation.title: Obtain Attire
supreme_negotiation.text: As you can see, the negotiation was a huge success.

supreme_negotiation.title: Greeting
supreme_negotiation.text: You came. Unfortunately, the negotiation has ended prematurely. This place looks quite impressive, doesn't it? As good a place for conversation as any.

supreme_negotiation.title: Ordinary Contact 1
supreme_negotiation.text: Hehe, to tame a beast, you must become more ferocious and savage than them.

supreme_negotiation.title: Ordinary Contact 2
supreme_negotiation.text: The future of Syndicate? Sigh, I don't have the answer to that yet, but I will find it, in my own way.

supreme_negotiation.title: Ordinary Contact 3
supreme_negotiation.text: Do you envy them? I can tell that you do by the look in your eyes.

supreme_negotiation.title: Ordinary Contact 4
supreme_negotiation.text: The fire of violence has died, but the embers remain in our heart, smoldering in every dark corner and waiting to be reignited.

supreme_negotiation.title: Idle
supreme_negotiation.text: You did a great job guarding this place. Good doggy.

supreme_negotiation.title: Special Attention
supreme_negotiation.text: This outfit is not bad for a negotiation meeting, but I'm not going to move as freely in this if things get physical... Sigh...Well, it's a nice gift from you guys, after all.

supreme_negotiation.title: Level Up
supreme_negotiation.text: Your words carry weight only when you have the power.

supreme_negotiation.title: Pat Head
supreme_negotiation.text: Your bravery never ceases to amaze.
